de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientAnswerEdit


  • public interface IClientAnswerEdit
    It's called if the answer is edited after it was sent. It happens from the customer tree. In the case an answer panel will be visible so that the operator can edit the answer.

    • Method Detail

      • getExtButtonList

        List<AbstractButton> getExtButtonList(BaseAnswerEditorPanel panel,
                                    Answer answer)
        Adds buttons right to the toolbar. This function is executed before the answer panel will be visible.
        Parameters:
        panel - the editor panel
        answer - the current answer
        Returns:
        a list of AbstractButtons. Null and an empty list are the valid values. They are used for the default behavior.

      • getTabList

        List<JComponent> getTabList(BaseAnswerEditorPanel panel,
                          Answer answer)
        Not in use. TODO Returns a list of tabs which can be added right on the tabbedpane. This function will be executed before the answer is edited.
        Parameters:
        panel - the editor panel
        answer - the current answer
        Returns:
        a list of tabs
